meanings.definition: A region considered with reference to its climate.
meanings.sent1: In tropical climes, the sun shines brightly all year round.
meanings.sent2: People from colder climes often enjoy visiting warmer destinations.
meanings.sent3: The penguins decided to take a vacation to tropical climes for a change.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a ray of sunshine in dreary climes.
meanings.sent5: The desert climes were so hot that even the cacti were sweating.

meanings.definition: A region or area with a particular climate.
meanings.sent1: The mountain climes were perfect for skiing in the winter.
meanings.sent2: Farmers in arid climes have developed innovative irrigation techniques.
meanings.sent3: The cozy cabin was nestled in the snowy climes of the Alps.
meanings.sent4: His heart longed for the familiar climes of his hometown.
meanings.sent5: The coastal climes provided a refreshing breeze on hot summer days.
